roleset.name: to surpass by a wide margin

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: `` Even the 7.2 % return from the risk - free three - month Treasury bill has easily outdistanced the 4.1 % return from junk bonds , '' wrote Moody 's economist John Lonski in yesterday 's market report .
example.arg: Even the 7.2 % return from the risk - free three - month Treasury bill

roleset.note: OUTDISTANCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'outdistance' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from outdistance.01-v predicate notes)
